typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{_col0_} as string,
		{_col1_} as integer,
		{_col2_} as string,
		{_col3_} as string,
		{_col4_} as date,
		{_col5_} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> AzureBlobDB2Export
AzureBlobDB2Export derive({_col5_} = regexReplace({_col5_}, '(\\d+).(\\d+).(\\d+)', '$1:$2:$3')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[''],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
